About Us

Your Trusted Healthcare & Teaching Institution

IQ City Medical College Hospital, Durgapur, is the region's first multispeciality hospital with an attached medical college. As part of the 100-acre IQ City Knowledge & Health Campus, it provides cutting-edge healthcare in a secure, compassionate, and affordable setting.

Total Happy Customers

Doctor Speaks

Expert Opinions from Our Doctors

Prof (Dr) Indranil Dutta

MBBS, MS (Gynaecology), Fellow - RCOG (UK), Cosmetic Surgery (USA): Professor & Sr. Consultant, IQ City Medical College Hospital

Infertility is defined as failure to achieve pregnancy after 12 months of regular, unprotected intercourse. However, it is best to evaluate after 6 months of unprotected intercourse if the woman is more than 35 years of age.

Common causes include issues with ovulation, sperm production, blocked fallopian tubes, and endometriosis. Age is also a significant factor for both partners.

Treatments range from medication to stimulate ovulation, surgical procedures to correct anatomical issues, and assisted reproductive technologies (ART) like IUI and IVF.
